questions.question: Taking place on a ship graveyard, this arc introduces the character of Brook and the concept of the Florian Triangle. What is...?
This arc is set in a marine base and features Luffy's attempt to infiltrate the base to retrieve a crew member. What is...?
This arc features the Straw Hat Pirates' journey to an underwater island and their encounter with a fish-man supremacist group. What is...?
This ability, used by a Straw Hat crew member, allows them to turn their body parts into weapons. What is...?
This Devil Fruit ability allows its user to turn themselves and anything they touch invisible. What is...?
This ability, used by a member of the Straw Hat crew, allows for the creation and manipulation of soap and bubbles. What is...?
This character, also known as 'God', was the former ruler of Skypiea and wielder of a powerful staff called the 'Goro Goro no Mi'. Who is...?
This new character, introduced in the Wano Country arc, is known for their claim to be the son of Kaido and for their mythical Zoan-type Devil Fruit. Who is...?
This character, also known as 'Hawk Eyes', is a master swordsman and one of the Seven Warlords of the Sea. Who is...?
